Header: Third Workshop on ‘Martial Arts’ Gives Away Certificates
Content: The Security Force Headquarters - Jaffna (SFHQ-J), in collaboration with the International Martial Arts Academy in Sri Lanka held the 3rd workshop on ‘Martial Arts’ in the year 2018 for Army personnel under command to the SFHQ-J during 07 - 12 November. Director and Chief Instructor of the International Martial Arts Academy, Mr. Prajalitha Pushpa Kumara conducted the workshop, attended by 100 male/female Army personnel in all formations under command to the SFHQ-J. On Monday (12), the Commander, Security Forces - Jaffna, Major General Darshana Hettiarachchi graced the closing ceremony of the workshop as the Chief Guest and awarded certificates to participant Senior Officers, Officers and Other Ranks. It was held at the auditorium in the Security Force Headquarters - Jaffna.
